alert.note: Alert for Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 3:11PM CDT until August 27 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Warning for... Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1000 PM CDT Thursday. * At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated that rain showers were diminishing in coverage and intensity across Stone county. Many roads, creeks, and streams remain flooded from the earlier significant rainfall and inundation flooding is expected to continue into this evening. Never attempt to cross a barricaded or flooded roadway. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wiggins, Perkinston, McHenry, Ten Mile, Perry, Big Level, Whites Crossing, Bond, Texas and Ramsey Springs.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
